modul.name: Lfo
modul.description: Low frequency oscilllator with multiple waveform types

vardef.name: waveform
vardef.description: Output Waveform: 0 sine, 1 trinangle, 2 square (bipolar), 3 square (unipolar), 4 ramp, 5 saw

modul.opcode: /* LFO with multiple waveforms */ opcode Lfo, k, kki kfrq, kamp, iwaveform xin kfrq limit kfrq, 0, 100 kamp limit kamp, 0, 50000 kout lfo kamp, kfrq, iwaveform xout kout endop
